original_text: For he himself is our peace, who has made us both one and has broken down in his flesh the dividing wall of hostility
korean_text: 그는 우리의 화평이신지라 둘로 하나를 만드사 원수 된 것 곧 중간에 막힌 담을 자기 육체로 허시고

sentences.original_text: For he himself is our peace,
who has made us both one
and has broken down in his flesh the dividing wall of hostility
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 육체로 원수 된 막힌 담을 허무셨습니다.
